mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing image sizes and using responsive design techniques to enhance mobile viewing experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Improve page load speed by compressing images and leveraging browser caching.
seoOptimizationTip: Ensure that meta descriptions, alt text for images, and relevant keywords are used on all pages.
userExperienceTip: Streamline the navigation menu and ensure consistency across all pages for a smoother experience.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps and offering more payment options.
tips: Focus on improving mobile responsiveness and site speed for better performance.
